Issue.creator: salmandabbakuti
Issue.summary: Chaincode instantiation fails for latest cc-env docker image
Issue.description: After, recent tag specification fix when choosing docker images, it is noticed that, 'latest' tag has been removed instead we should specify image version right? so instantiation command fails because it is choosing 'latest' cc-env image as it is depreciated. please look into the issue. !Screenshot (136).png!
